by using that, and releasing the taima particles that had charged in advance into her limbs all at once, she wouldn't control time, but she would accelerate the movements of her android arms ＆ legs to their utmost limits.
that was acceleration mode.
it lasted for about 5 seconds, but the result was that it became possible to perform all her movements at 100 times her normal speed.
it was a double-edged sword.
operation that exceeded their mechanical limits would cause significant damage to her limbs.
although her mechanical limbs compensated for most of that, the burden on asuka, who had to think about combat and control her limbs at ultra-high speed, was not small.
furthermore, it was unknown whether she could catch up with asagi by performing at 100 times her movement speed.
